    • Uses of Brush in BlobsSystem3D

      Subclasses of Brush in BlobsSystem3D 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BoxBrush
      A box brush is a brush materialized by a 3D parallelepiped.
      class  SphereBrush
      A sphere brush is a brush materialized by a 3D sphere.
